item.title: Help with autospawnpoints stuff
item.dc:creator: @Yazukaa Yazukaa
item.description:
@Yazukaa wrote:

ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 2998, 3381, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false);

1351 - The item identification.
2998 - The coordinate x.
3381 - The coordinate y.
1 - The amount of the item.

You can change the item identification and the coordinates. If you wanted to spawn money, you would use this code.

ItemHandler.addItem(0995, 0000, 0000, 1000, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false);

Read full topic

item.title: Help with autospawnpoints stuff
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

can some1 explain or give little example of adding a item to autospawn points.

this is what is in my autospawnpoints

// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 2998, 3381, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Training Bronze Axe
spawntimer = 100;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}

i dont know how to add a item to this can some1 hlp thks.

Read full topic
